text: Bancourt is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small farming village located 10 miles (16 km) south of Arras at the junction of the D7 and D7E1 roads. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Remi, rebuilt, like the village, after 1918. * The Bancourt British Cemetery. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * CWGC Bancourt cemetery Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Bancourt
